BBEX3.A.LVL.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Latvia / EUR 1 = LVL ... (middle)
General: Accession to the European Monetary Union on 1 January 2014; irrevocable euro conversion rate: EUR 1 = LVL 0.702804.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates, from 2012 on the basis of month-end rates.
